name: Full Stack Swag Cap
description: Full stack swag. Moves so fast you’ll forget the price of gas. Polygon is a protocol and a framework for building, connecting and scaling Ethereum-compatible blockchain networks. This fashion isn’t just ordinary fashion. It onboards you into an entire world of NFTs, Decentralized Finance, Crypto and Web3. Every fashion piece is a unique NFT that can also earn you yield in $MONA token and other crypto. We are melting the centralized exploitative crown to weave the fabric of a generative ecosystem.

attributes.value: Fashion x DeFi, Wear to DeFi
